item.description:
SolarFest -- July 11, 12, and 13, 2008

On a beautiful July weekend, several thousand people come to SolarFest to join a weekend community. We are inspired by art and technology, by the talent and ability of all the diverse individuals who make the festival (many of the volunteers have been doing this for over a decade), to create a place where learning and fun thrive. Flyby News has been a part of it, too, providing publicity and resources. Each year more folks are learning more about key issues for life's survival in the 21st Century. Learn more about this most beautiful festival at SolarFest.org

To learn more, check out list of Festival Performers.

Also this links to Festioval Workshops.
item.how_to_find_us: Check for the Flyby News table in large canvass barn, next to Vermont Soaps
item.why: This is the most affordable, clean energy, music-fun festival of the summer.. chill - out and replenish the 9/11 truth movement..
item.name: SolarFest 2008 - Renewable Energy Festival
